reviewText: I was extremely disappointed in this video which only gave a little viewing of the Sultan Ahmed Mosque.  The DVD showed the Bosphorus, the Grand Bazaar and the Hagia Sophia Museum but I was more interested in seeing the details of the blue Iznik tiles in the Mosque and this did not happen. The tiles are its charm and drawcard.  After all, one mosque in Istanbul looks like another.  The DVD was very disappointing.

This was the best of 3 DVDs that I bought at the same time.
Besides the money shots of ceiling tiles, the history provided set the right tone to appreciate this masterpiece.  See you in Istanbul!
Mike Barrett
Baltimore
